full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Master Data Management Market Analysis
------------

##Reference Information
-------------

* **Title:** Master Data Management Market Analysis
* **Reference Number:** CB-11-28142104
* **Amendment Number:** 6
* **Solicitation Number:** 100024928
* **Publication Date:** November 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* **Amendment Date:** December 12, 2023

## Procurement Details
------------

* **Procurement Category:** Service Request (SRV)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Selective Tendering
* **Evaluation Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Accord Commercials (Trade Agreements):** Please refer to the Tender Description or Tender Documents

## Contract Specifications
------------

* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada, National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 19, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** January 30, 2024

## Tender Details
------------

* **Services Required:** Employment and Social Development Canada seeks the expertise of a Master Data Management (MDM) Analysis provider to assess and prioritize the business drivers and use cases for an MDM capability.
* **Tender Description:** This contract aims to provide advice on defining an MDM capability that delivers a single-client-view at the point of service and enables cross-program insights. This procurement is subject to set-aside from international trade agreements for Indigenous businesses.

## Contact Information
------------

* **Contact Person:** Pascale Lafontaine
* **Contact Email:** nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone:** (000) 000-0000

## Tender Documents
------------

* **Tender Notice PDF:** [Available on the Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25303/npp-100024928.pdf)
* **Appendix:** [Attached to the tender notice document]

Note: All the necessary information has been preserved in the rewritten version, and rambling sections were removed to conform to your 400-word request. Everything should now look professional and easy to read. Whenever information regarding
